comment: He was an AMAZING teacher and was certainly my favorite professor out of the whole semester. He was very detailed in his explanations and was very approachable when someone needed to ask him a question. Mr. Rosenberg continually went out of his way to help me with calculations I didn't understand. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR, you certainly wont regret it!!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Super nice and helpful guy. Explains everything before/during labs to help you understand. 8 Quizzes (drops 2 lowest), 6 Labs (drops lowest), 6 Content Assessments (drops lowest), Participation Grade, and Grade over Lab Notebook.

He was such a great professor!! He has a sense of humor that I have never seen before. He really cares about all of the students and wants us to pass. He knows so much about chemistry and loves it, which made the class super fun! I would highly recommend taking him if you get the chance.
Goofy but very smart! Wiling to help and answer questions. One of my favorite teachers! If he taught 1152L I'd take him for that too.
I love him! He is so nice and funny! All you have to do is show up and put in effort. I would recommend to anyone!

Been at KSU for 2 years and he is the BEST professor I've ever had. He is very funny and cares about you passing. Basic homework for labs, content assessment (which were kind of hard) and then your final. Final of course if the labs. Pay attention do ALL your homework GO TO CLASS you'll pass.

TAKE THIS CLASS!!!! You will not regret it!  Summer classes are a pain, but I drove and 1.5 hrs  to class every Friday with such a good attitude because I knew the class would be fun! If you don't understand lecture he will review with you 30ish minutes before doing the experiment itself. Do your work and follow instructions and you'll do well!

Mr. Rosenberg was a riot. His sense of humor was relaxing, which is very important in a lab instructor, and his thorough knowledge of his subject, put to good use in his prefaces to each experiment, was reassuring. I'm glad I took this course with him.
One of the most down to earth professors I've ever had. He is an amazing teacher and really knows what he's talking about. I would take him again and recommend him to everyone!
He is an amazing lab professor, especially if you just don't get chemistry. Would recommend to anybody!!

Professor Rosenberg is the best. He's helpful, nice, he tries to be supportive, and he's funny. He grades lab reports in green because he wants it to seem less harsh, which I think is thoughtful of him. The content assessments are hard but that's to be expected. I would take him for 1152L if I could, but he doesn't teach it. Take him if you can!
Mr. Rosenberg was great! If you are willing to try, you will make an A in this course! Super easy and fun! There is at least one online quiz/test a week. I would recommend this professor!
Take him if you are a nursing major! He's so nice and willing to help if you ask. I would definitely take his class if he taught 1152L.
Great. Professor. You must take hiM for lab. Really. Do it.
Enjoyed the class, was taught well and very clear cut. Content Assessments were always a pain but that's not his fault. Grades Lab Manuals and notebooks fairly leniently.

If you have any concerns or questions, just ask and he is more then willing to help. He is a very nice guy. The Lab Reports are easy as long as you do the experiment. Content Assessments suck, you usually do not understand them because it hasn't been taught in lecture, good news is they don't count as much of your grade. Final is challenging.
Great teacher, he loves what he does and understands that not everyone gets chem. Plus he is very helpful and easy grader so as long as you do the work its an easy A. wish that he taught 1152 lol

Great lab professor! Got A's on all of my lab reports. I hate the online aspect of the lab, but online tests and quizzes are only a small part of your grade so it's not awful. Very specific on rounding and sig figs but otherwise he is great. I recommend him to all nursing professors, would definitely take him again.

TAKE HIM FOR LAB!! He is a great professor. He is young and very nice. He will help you through every problem. He does like you to be very specific on lab reports. For example, correct sig figs and units. Overall you will pass with an A. He makes it really easy!!!

He is the best lab teacher ive had so far and i have taken chem lab 3 times but also at different schools. He's always there to help and very understanding if you have to miss class cause of something important. i would recommend taking him for lab i wish he did chem 1212 lab.
Explains everything in lab so you know what youre doing when you go home and finish reports.

Just take him! He is extremely helpful. He would come around to everyone about 3 times during the lab to make sure everyone knew what they were doing. He's not a harsh grader, and he's a really nice guy. You will not regret taking him. If you do poorly in his lab, then you must have put ZERO effort in the entire semester!
this professor is awesome, awesome, awesome, awesome, awesome!!!!! I will definitely take him again. TAKE HIM.
Best professor i've had out of all my classes. he is a great lab prof. I highly recommend taking him. you will never regret. I will definitely him again.
Pretty good. Be careful on how you write your math and how you do it. Overall good lab teacher. Not my best though.

I think I speak for all when I say this is the best chem lab teacher. Extremely understanding and helpful, and makes the labs easy for everybody. As long as you show up and do the labs, you have an A, no questions asked. Best professor i've had out of all my classes.
